results.content: This course is just so awesome. When I was starting on this course. It seemed very difficult for me as non techie person to get these things done. But I did it and improved my site speed from 54 to 67 for mobile and 65 to 80 for desktop. Highly recommentded

results.content: There were a few things that kept me from giving this a 5 star rating. First, I'd like to say I learned a ton of stuff. It did as it promised. My websites are faster than they have ever been and rating higher on the back end. However, there were two areas in this video that totally shut down one of my websites. I had to remove them completely to get them to come back. I asked a question about it in the support area, but got no response. I also noticed other students had asked questions that were not answered. The only other thing that annoyed me is they play music on the beginning and end of every video. It only bugged me because I watched this who course in mostly one day. It probably wouldn't even bother most people. Anywho, I would highly recommend this course, but make sure you backup your site before you make any of the suggested changes.
results.content_html: There were a few things that kept me from giving this a 5 star rating. First, I'd like to say I learned a ton of stuff. It did as it promised. My websites are faster than they have ever been and rating higher on the back end. However, there were two areas in this video that totally shut down one of my websites. I had to remove them completely to get them to come back. I asked a question about it in the support area, but got no response. I also noticed other students had asked questions that were not answered. The only other thing that annoyed me is they play music on the beginning and end of every video. It only bugged me because I watched this who course in mostly one day. It probably wouldn't even bother most people. Anywho, I would highly recommend this course, but make sure you backup your site before you make any of the suggested changes.

results.content:
The tutorial is perfect for the optimization of the wordpress site if you are starting out and don't want to dig in and code performance optimization functions. Also this is for people who don't control their servers, meaning the server is handled by your host.

Most of what you'll find is everywhere on the internet, this is just a compilation of much of everything you need to start optimizing your site.

results.content: I wanted to improve the speed of my WordPress website as speed is extremely crucial to my niche. I need the users to search and browse around my website in great speed. So this course sounded like a good option for me and I must say that I’m impressed. The lectures are up to the point, very relevant and nicely explained. The image, home page and database optimization have largely helped me in vastly improving my speed. I learned so many things that I wasn’t even aware that they existed. The bonus section was also nice. Great course from which I'm already seeing great results!
